quote: How many young men fear that there is a monster inside them? People are supposed to fear others, not themselves. People are supposed to aspire to become their fathers, not shudder at the thought.
quote_letters: HOW MANY YOUNG MEN FEAR THAT THERE IS A MONSTER INSIDE THEM PEOPLE ARE SUPPOSED TO FEAR OTHERS NOT THEMSELVES PEOPLE ARE SUPPOSED TO ASPIRE TO BECOME THEIR FATHERS NOT SHUDDER AT THE THOUGHT
